mapper.select: SELECT FILENAME FROM TMSTEVENT WHERE SYSDATE >= EVENT_STARTDATE AND SYSDATE < EVENT_ENDDATE ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
SELECT EVENT_NO FROM TMSTEVENT WHERE SYSDATE >= EVENT_STARTDATE AND SYSDATE < EVENT_ENDDATE ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC
SELECT S_IMG1 FROM ( SELECT S_IMG1 FROM TMSTSTAY ORDER BY S_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT B.S_NO, B.S_IMG1 FROM TMSTMEMBER A INNER JOIN ( SELECT S_NO, S_IMG1, ';' || TRIM(LEADING ';' FROM NVL2(S_THEME1, ';' || S_THEME1, S_THEME1) || NVL2(S_THEME2, ';' || S_THEME2, S_THEME2) || NVL2(S_THEME3, ';' || S_THEME3, S_THEME3) || NVL2(S_THEME4, ';' || S_THEME4, S_THEME4) || NVL2(S_THEME5, ';' || S_THEME5, S_THEME5) || NVL2(S_THEME6, ';' || S_THEME6, S_THEME6) || NVL2(S_THEME7, ';' || S_THEME7, S_THEME7) || NVL2(S_THEME8, ';' || S_THEME8, S_THEME8) ) || ';' AS S_THEME_LIST FROM TMSTSTAY ) B ON (B.S_THEME_LIST LIKE '%;' || A.M_THEME1 || ';%') OR (B.S_THEME_LIST LIKE '%;' || TO_CHAR(A.M_THEME2) || ';%') OR (B.S_THEME_LIST LIKE '%;' || TO_CHAR(A.M_THEME3) || ';%') WHERE A.M_NO = #{param1}
